name: grover's tavern
description:
fantasy au where i am a princess and hijikata (gintama) is a wizard but his magic is mainly mayo related because that's how he is and we are both thrown into a dungeon, it's like meet cute but not cute at all we just meet there. it's actually grover's (sesame street) dungeon and he is punishing us. help us escape. and also gibi (glasses) nuby (ponytail) and goodwall (bald baby) are there too tho.

this obviously not sears and also we dont own gintama or sesame street
